record.dc:title: 19-537 Cox Mound Site 5AN19, Anderson County, Tennessee. Mound 1. Feature 3, Log stairway. Direction southwest.
record.wpa:narrative: Series of eight posts lying in a horizontal position, each succeeding one being at a higher level. These posts started at the village floor level and gradually ascended to the burned floor area about 60" above the village level as would a series of steps. Distance apart starting at bottom: 1 to 2, 20"; 2 to 3, 16"; 3 to 4, 17"; 4 to 5, 21"; 5 to 6, 19"; 6 to 7, 20"; 7 to 8, 19".
record.wpa:comments: No record on file for this photograph. However narrative information is available for this feature. See also photographs 19-528 [fhn00088], 19-529 [fhm00089], and MF4 [fhm01838].
